CEEvent.Name: concubine_approach_devotion
CEEvent.Text: {=Concubine_Text_1}The sun is setting as you finish organizing supplies, casting golden light across the room when your beloved concubine enters. "I've dreamed of serving you again and again," she confesses breathlessly, "of feeling your presence fill my being completely." Her chest rises and falls rapidly as she waits for your command, her entire existence focused on pleasing you.
